meta.title: CFP Land
meta.description: Calls for Proposals, Tech Conferences, and Speaking Tips
meta.author: Karl L. Hughes

data.name: Code BEAM SF
data.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: AllThingsRTC 2020
relatedRecords.description: The Agora AllThingsRTC 2020 event will take place at the Metreon City View in San Francisco on August 27. Submit to the AllThingsRTC 2020 Conference Call for Papers and become a recognized expert in Real-Time Communications (RTC).

relatedRecords.name: Midwest Dreamin' 2019
relatedRecords.description: Midwest Dreamin’ is a conference organized by the Salesforce Community. Join this super user group meeting to learn and meet people in your community.

relatedRecords.name: API The Docs Amsterdam 2019
relatedRecords.description: 11 October, 2019 - this year’s API the Docs conference in Europe, in cooperation with the Write The Docs Amsterdam meetup group and with the support of ABN Amro.

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.
